data.actual_result: The green ring around your name stays even when you're not holding your push to talk bind.
data.expected_result: The green ring around your name should work properly when you talk.
data.short_description: People can hear you when you have push to talk on and not holding your bind. [Windows 10 Home Specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice chat(in a server) - Go to settings > Voice settings - Turn on push to talk and make a shortcut - Go back to your call - Right click Settings - Go to voice and video - Hold down your push to talk bind as you click 'switch to voice activity' - Let go of your bind and click 'switch to Push to talk'  - See how your voice is active when you're not holding your bind.
